uvi.description:
scsi: advansys: Fix kernel pointer leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.218 by commit f5a0ba4a9b5e70e7b2f767636d26523f9d1ac59d. For more details please see the references link.
